documents.document: A #Believer in #Jesus #Christ should be Fearless_Living totally independent of all worldly systems-established in #God's Love & His #Kingdom
If #Jesus #Christ has said it-you the believer can do it-Jesus isn't speaking in riddles-He wants you to know & accomplish His will-Eph5:17
There's Absolutely No Passivity_No Uncertainty when a believer has Faith in #God's Integrity_Blessed Are Those Who Overcome NOT get over run
Faced with a major decision & haven't a clue what to do_Don't Panic-#Jesus #Christ is & has your answer-Peace Be Still & Listen To Him Say-
In times of trouble James declares to count it all Joy-NOW how could you do that without knowing you'd win_that everything works out fine!
"For of whom a man is overcome,of the same is bought unto bondage"#Jesus #Christ delivered you from the pit_Be sure you stay out of vomit-
Listen if #Jesus #Christ in you is greater than anything facing you_Why the Fear_apprehension_inadequacy_inferiority when facing a mountain?
To Go A Day Without #Jesus Is To Hazard The Possibility Of Losing Your Saltiness & Being Good For Nothing Except Be… https://t.co/7b7jtbjQTs
Remember - the Holy Spirit #Jesus sent to you to lead you into all the Truth is your helper not your servant - He w… https://t.co/SOcR9PUbNF
If it wasn't for the active vital faith & living relationship with God Almighty of Elisha the servant would have be… https://t.co/KECapG2NPK
#Jesus #Christ flows through all those abiding in Him - the rest perish - having lost their saltiness thus good for… https://t.co/9tjlC5GSFu
The Centurion's great #faith was based on his experiential understanding of #authority-He recognised #Jesus #Christ's Authority to command!
Faith Without Action Is Dead_a #christian is to fight the good fight of #faith & win_Not bundle up in a corner hiding from the scary devil-
NOTHING CAN STOP #JESUS #CHRIST'S PLAN FOR YOUR LIFE - EXCEPT YOU - take the Israelites' at the Promised Land's Bor… https://t.co/vSRF8oDR0E
Where Are The #PRAYER WARRIORS who are awake to stop the Anti-Christ's ploy - to plant tares in their Nations whilst the #Church sleeps?!
There was a time in the #Church of #Jesus #Christ that prayer power warriors would scared the Hell out of opposing Kings let alone their own
INTERSESSION SHOULD BE A DAILY WORK OF THE #CHURCH OF #JESUS #CHRIST - every Church everywhere should be interceding for God's Kingdom Come!
Can't face another day_thinking of ending it all BUT all you need is for something to go right for a change-#Jesus #Christ can sort it - ASK
Hey #Christian - if you're not INTERCEDING FOR YOUR NATION cause your too busy for that - UNDERSTAND WHILST YOU SLEEP ANTI-CHRIST IS AT WORK
It's Simple #Christian - NO INTERCESSION - NO SUPERNATURAL MANIFESTATION OF #JESUS #CHRIST'S POWER INTERVENTIONS FOR YOUR NATION - Wake Up!
#Christian you needs wake up-The Anti-Christ Spirit Has Declared War On You-if your not prayed & fasted up - Satan will run right over you!
It's Those Who Abide In The Secret Place of #Jesus #Christ who fear no evil, who are blessed under His ever present loving protection - Amen
If you're not ABIDING IN THE VINE of #Jesus #Christ what if any protection do you have in these uncertain times - AWAKE SLOTHFUL SLEEPER -
When Was The Last Time You INTERCEDED FOR NATIONAL LEADERSHIP - hope you're not one who takes your Liberty for granted - Needs God's Wisdom!
#Christian if you're not strong in your faith- if you're not competent in your authority in #Jesus #Christ you'll deny Christ under pressure
Awake you that sleep - arise from the dead & #Christ shall give you light - see then you walk diligent-Redeem The Time For The Days Are Evil
#Jesus #Christ Is A Soul Winner & So Am I_what about you_What do you do for Jesus_Attending Church isn't enough - Win Souls! #EuropaAfricaUS
The Interceding #Christian of #Jesus #Christ ushers' in His power & might - dynamic in it's working - forwarding His Kingdom - are you one?
The #Church of #Jesus #Christ is asleep & the Anti Christ Spirit is planting tares everywhere - What Price Liberty - Eternal Vigilance -
Your fight's against Satan's anti-christ spirit - Don't be offended by or afraid of people - INTERCEDE FOR #CHRIST'S POWER TO MANIFEST NOW
There's Nothing you can't overcome in #Jesus #Christ-Jesus with all His Power to overcome is Living IN You-Why Not Let Him Empower You?
#Fear has no place in the heart of a #Christian in fact it can't elsewise #Jesus #Christ is a liar-Fear is torment in your head-Kick IT OUT!
You the born again believer-a Son of God have been authorised through your faith in #Jesus #Christ to operate in His Authority over all evil
#Jesus #Christ lives in & has his expression through the believer-He lives in you NOT beside you-He fights through you NOT apart from you-NT
They've made changes at work_you've been laid off_You don't know what's going to happen BUT #Jesus #Christ does & will help you sort it-ASK
OPEN YOUR EYES & SEE #CHURCH - ALL IS NOT WELL- you've taken your liberty in #Jesus #Christ for granted & now face losing it #EuropaAfricaUS
FIGHT THE GOOD FIGHT OF FAITH - having everything laid out for you on a plate is over #CHURCH- Obey #Jesus #Christ INTERCEDE #EuropaAfricaUS
The Current #Church Has Been Coasting On the #INTERCESSION of past generations of #believers but that's finished now #JESUS #EuropaAfricaUS
#Jesus admonishes you not to be afraid OR troubled by anything-giving you His confident Peace that Knows-Nothing by any means will harm you!
Don't Wait Till The Enemy's At Your Door - it'll be far too late then to prevent the bloodshed- INTERCESSION MAKES FOR PEACE #EuropaAfricaUS
#Doctrines of demons promote self interest - a lethargic towards their responsibility for the #Intercession of Rulers #Jesus #EuropaAfricaUS
Cruel mockings & scourgings- bonds & imprisonment- believers slain with swords awaits a sleeping church-Arise #Jesus #Christ #EuropaAfricaUS
THE MAJOR EVENT IN EVERY CHURCH SHOULD BE INTERCESSION to break Satan's end time take over plan through faith #Jesus #Christ #EuropaAfricaUS
Believers in #Jesus #Christ wax valiant in fight through faith - the #God kind of faith that moves mountains in INTERCESSION #EuropaAfricaUS
NO POINT HAVING #JESUS #CHRIST'S POWER & AUTHORITY if you don't use it #Church - Every Church Should Sound Of Intercession #EuropaAfricaUS
#Jesus #Christ HAS ALL AUTHORITY - in His Name that contains all this authority-the gates of Hell won't overpower His Church #EuropaAfricaUS
WHO THROUGH FAITH SUBDUED KINGDOMS - A Church asleep is a push over for the devil's henchman- WAKE UP #CHURCH #Jesus #Christ #EuropaAfricaUS
WHERE IS THE #CHURCH_there will be no turning to flight the armies of the aliens whithout aggressive faith & go intercession #EuropaAfricaUS
The first responsibility of #Jesus #Christ's Church is intercession for Rulers' of Nations-Pathetic To Think Things Are Good #EuropaAfricaUS
Even in the Old Testatment #Bible #Jesus #Christ expects His servants to move the mountains defiantly standing in their way- MOUTAINS MOVE!
If you don't renew the Spirit of your mind to embrace the integral certainty of #Jesus #Christ's Word you'll drown in Fear & insignificance!
Haven't you read #Jesus #Christ declared a house divided can't stand-Why then would Jesus want you battling with uncertainty-Be Single Eyed!
The believer in #Jesus #Christ potentially is an extraordinary individual-once they've renewed their mind to align with His abiding presence
Come to the end of your rope_Seems there's nobody to help OR even cares if your live OR die-#Jesus #Christ cares & will help you sort it-ASK
Do the things that happen which you can't explain intellectually change the Integrity of #Jesus #Christ? Not at all-Take Abraham's example-
#Jesus #Christ's Church has a dilemma-It's full of immature pathetically weak babies totally self absorbed & their #Pastors are allowing it!
I AM A Christian because I've become One Spirit with #Jesus #Christ & know that #GodIsHope & Loves me just like #JesusLovesYou-Yes You!
You don't have to understand intellectually how faith in #Jesus #Christ works His #Kingdom provision just act on it & enjoy the results!
WHEN YOU SAY_as a believer in #Jesus #Christ's Integral Authority-stuff happens in Heaven-Earth-Hell & that Authority Is In His Name JESUS!
#Results are governed by how you see things & the heart committed Faith action you put into doing what you believe you'll harvest 30-60-100%
I #hate my #life-Well what are you going to do about it-JesusChristEmpowersAwesomeChanges-ASK Now & Live Blessed #teen #pain #ouch #sosore
Your Faith in God's Integrity will be tested_You need to study & apply God's Word daily to strengthen it_Pass the tests & enjoy the spoils!
Puzzling_that a Born Again Child of God who worships #Jesus #Christ has no experiential understanding that Christ's in them NOT beside them?
#Jesus #Christ wants you to be confident to act on the #certainty of His #Promises so He swore an oath to confirm His intent to you - #Truth
Ever Increasing Faith_It's your responsibility to build yourself up & keep built up in #Jesus #Christ-Your Faith in Him Works-In Him You Win
"And let us not weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not. "There it is "IF" Never forget you have an adversary!
The Integrity of #Jesus #Christ gives His believers certainty in their believing-they rest assured-they're accepted_blessed_loved_empowered!
#Behold I have given you my authority to advance all over the power & ability of the enemy & nothing in any case harm you'"(Lk 10:19) #JESUS
#Christ in you is greater than anything opposing you & that's why you can be bolder than a conqueror-#Jesus the Conqueror empowers you to do
#Jesus #Christ has exalted His #Covenant #Word of Promises above His Name-He in fact is subservient to His Word of promise to you-Act On It!
Bible Hope Is Based Entirely On The Promises Of #God's Integrity-Ensuring Hope's Certainty-thus the joy & peace in the believer's believing!
In Mark 10:29-31 #Jesus #Christ is expounding on the 100 fold return for prioritizing & proclaiming with demonstrations His Kingdom Message!
Cast not away your confidence_your Faith in #Jesus #Christ due to circumstantial pressures-don't let go of your harvests now due to reap!
#Jesus #Christ declared "IF" you believe_the "Works I do" you will do - seems there's no catch here except you have to Believe-DevelopFaith!
Let #Jesus #Christ Arise in you & your enemies will scatter-There Is No #Fear In The Spirit Of Christ In You-Why should you be afraid-PRAISE
#Jesus #Christ was amazed at His disciples'unbelief given their imparted authority to do miracles in His Name-He gave them Power Of Attorney
Every #Believer should have "The Attitude Of Faith in #Jesus #Christ"-Fearless & Bold in the knowledge-His Integrity gives them Certainty!
Satan attacks believers provision flowing from their #prayer of #faith-by harassing their minds circumstantially_in a bid to make them quit-
"Now the just shall live by #faith: but if he draw back in fear, My soul shall have no pleasure in him"Use your Faith in #Jesus OR lose it-
The period between believing prayer & it's results being manifested are to be filled entirely with the CERTAINTY of Jesus Christ's Integrity
Focus On The Integrity Of #Jesus #Christ's Word To You & you won't doubt in your heart-your faith will develop & grow strong-Mountains Move!
Live in possession of the promises of God by faith-the Grace of #Christ's Power Works Miraculously - It's through faith action one receives!
Faith in God's Word takes possession of things promised & receives them in Jesus Name-There's Never Any-lets wait & see if something happens
The prayer of faith- You don't pray & wait to see if something happens- You know something happened- You don't need to see it to believe it-
#Jesus #Christ dealt with unexpected disastrous circumstances the same as you BUT He used His Faith & commanded it to Stop & You Can Too!
The Love of #Jesus #Christ for you is never in question but yours that's another matter! #Bible #Truth #God #Love #Life #Lord #Christian
Church Leadership are responsible before #Jesus Christ-to recruit & Train Soldiers_To do the work of the Evangelist & reap Cities for Christ
Develop your #Faith Attitude in #Jesus #Christ-A mindset fixed on triumph-knowing Love never fails to work miracles for those who believe!
The spiritual force PATIENCE_WORKS_there's nothing passive bout patience_It is a Never Will I Quit Winning Faith Attitude in #Jesus #Christ!
With Faith in #Jesus #Christ two fish & five loaves is enough to meet any need you have with plenty left over.My Cup Is Full & Running Over!
Storms come & they go-If you're prepared to handle come what may in #Jesus #Christ you'll fare well & blaze a path of Faith Glorifying Jesus
#Jesus #Christ never stops loving you BUT He has to stop Blessing you when you allow yourself to become a Hearer only! #Christian #Kingdom
Therefore if any man be in #Jesus Christ he has become a NEW MAN-old things have passed away-behold all things have become new #bible #love
#Shattered-he's just walked out-you haven't a clue what went wrong_You're blaming yourself & just want to die-Don't-#Jesus will help you-ASK
"To him who overcometh "our resurrected #Jesus #Christ appears to have a vastly different view than most #Christians wanting to flee earth!
The Cares Of This World choke out #Jesus #Christ's Solutions_So Clear Your Thinking-Deliberately Remove ALL Care Now & affirm IN HIM I WIN!
"I can do all things through #Christ who strengthens me" Abiding in the Vine has the power of God empowering you to accomplish His exploits!
Yes #Jesus #Christ's Love for you is unconditional BUT His promises are conditional upon you're being a Doer of His #Word NOT just a hearer!
#Christian if you're living your Life in the flesh now by faith in #Jesus #Christ-the power of His Name is at your disposal to work miracles
The #Kingdom of #God is within_You need be God Inside Minded-#Jesus' Glory & Power flows from within-that's why You Can DO All Things In Him
